def_en: In some systems of government, a governor is a person who is in charge of the political administration of a region or state.

def_cn: （学校、医院等的)董事,理事
def_en: A governor is a member of a committee which controls an organization such as a school or a hospital.

def_cn: （英国一些机构的）主管,总裁
def_en: In some British institutions, the governor is the most senior official, who is in charge of the institution.
